name: Adventure of the wheek
description:
Life as a guinea pig is so boring... sitting around all day in a pen, eating, sleeping... You've watched out the window for your whole life yearning to feel the grass on your little tippy tappies and today is the day!

Interactive, choose your own adventure game where you play as a guinea pig on an adventure.
